# SetItemNameFunction Class

## Extends
- [*LootItemFunction*](LootItemFunction.md)

Loot item function that modifies the name of the item dropped.

## Properties

### **name**
`read-only name: string;`

The name to apply to the dropped item.

Type: *string*
